Tasks.TaskDescription: Create index.html, this should be the site's homepage
Create animals.html, this is page lists all animals available on the site
Create contact.html page where a user can leave feedback about the site
Create save.html, this page will be displayed when a user submits the form on contact.html
[Bonus] - After displaying the save page, redirect to the home page after x seconds.
Create a page with a save button, load button and a form.
When the save button is pressed the form's content is saved into the browser storage.
When the load button pressed the data is filled back from the browser save data
[Bonus]: Make a persistent background color selector for the page. When the user selects a color, the background is in this color, and when he opens the page again this color remains.
Create a page with a button that makes a request to the following api: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/photos on a press of the button.
Disply the first 100 images returned from the request in a table.
The table needs to have the following attributes: album id, id, title, and the image itself.

LectureAssignments.Title: Create a CV page for yourself.

Tasks.TaskDescription: The page has to have 3 sections, header, details and skills
Header contains the main title of the page
The details component gives general information about you
The skills component lists your skills in a list <ul>
The details pages also contains an image of you.
Check the assignment url for a drawing of the page layout.
Create a site for the employees of the Northwind company
The homepage contains a brief info on the company and shows the company's logo.
The employees page has a table of the employees with the folowing data, first,last names, date of birth and an image
The about page contains the company's address and a list of countries and cities the company's employees hail from.
